div.p: Upload below the quotation that you received from your supplier for this RFQ as XML or PDF file. When you click on the Update RFQ button:

ol.li: If it is an XML file, Odoo will parse it if the module that adds support for this XML format is installed. For the Universal Business Language format (UBL), you should install the module purchase_order_import_ubl.
If it is a PDF file, Odoo will try to find an XML file in the attachments of the PDF file and then use this XML file.

div.p: Then, Odoo will compare the imported quotation and the current RFQ:

ul.li: for lines that are present both in the imported quotation and in the RFQ, Odoo will update the unit prices (and also the quantities, depending on the chosen option),
for the lines that are present only in the quotation (shipping costs for example), Odoo will add them to the RFQ,
for the lines that are present only in the RFQ, Odoo will put a warning message in the chatter (it won't delete them automatically).
